zh-cn: 亨利·菲利普·贝诺尼·奥梅尔·约瑟夫·贝当
en: Henri Philippe Benoni Omer Joseph Pétain

description.zh-cn: 法国军事将领、政治家及法国元帅。第一次世界大战中因凡尔登战役的胜利而成为民族英雄，但在第二次世界大战期间领导与纳粹德国合作的维希法国政府，战后被判叛国罪。
description.en: A French general, politician, and Marshal of France. He became a national hero for his victory at the Battle of Verdun in World War I, but led the collaborationist Vichy France regime with Nazi Germany during World War II, for which he was convicted of treason.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，在法国未被德军占领的南部地区成立的政府，由菲利普·贝当担任国家元首，与纳粹德国合作。
description.en: The government established in the southern, unoccupied zone of France during World War II, headed by Philippe Pétain, which collaborated with Nazi Germany.

description.zh-cn: 1870年至1940年间的法国共和政府。在第二次世界大战中被纳粹德国击败后解体。
description.en: The republican government of France from 1870 to 1940. It collapsed after the defeat by Nazi Germany in World War II.

description.zh-cn: 法国军事家、政治家，第二次世界大战期间领导自由法国运动，战后成为法兰西第五共和国的创建者和首任总统。
description.en: French general and statesman who led the Free French Forces during World War II. He later founded the French Fifth Republic in 1958 and served as its first president.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治家，法兰西第三共和国倒数第二任总理。在1940年法国战役期间任命贝当为副总理。
description.en: French politician and the penultimate Prime Minister of the French Third Republic. He appointed Pétain as Vice Premier during the Battle of France in 1940.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治家，法兰西第三共和国的最后一任总统。
description.en: French politician, the last President of the French Third Republic.

description.zh-cn: 一场主要发生在欧洲的全球性战争。
description.en: A global war originating in Europe.

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战中西线战场上的一次重要战役，法军在菲利普·贝当的指挥下成功抵御了德军的进攻。
description.en: A major battle on the Western Front in World War I, where French forces under the command of Philippe Pétain successfully repelled a German offensive.

description.zh-cn: 1917年由法军总司令罗贝尔·尼维尔发动的一次大规模攻势，因伤亡惨重而失败，并引发了法军兵变。
description.en: A massive but failed offensive launched in 1917 by French Commander-in-Chief Robert Nivelle, which resulted in catastrophic casualties and led to widespread mutinies in the French army.

description.zh-cn: 第一次世界大战期间的法国炮兵将领，因尼维尔攻势的失败而被解职。
description.en: A French artillery general officer who served in World War I, dismissed after the failure of the Nivelle Offensive.

description.zh-cn: 1933年至1945年期间由阿道夫·希特勒和纳粹党统治下的德国。
description.en: Germany between 1933 and 1945, when it was governed by Adolf Hitler and the Nazi Party.

nodes.id: 第二次贡比涅停战协定

zh-cn: 第二次贡比涅停战协定

description.zh-cn: 1940年6月22日法国与纳粹德国签订的停战协定，标志着法国在法国战役中的失败，并导致德国占领法国北部和西部地区。
description.en: The armistice signed on 22 June 1940 between France and Nazi Germany, which marked France's defeat in the Battle of France and led to the German occupation of northern and western France.

description.zh-cn: 第二次世界大战期间，盟军和法国抵抗运动将德国占领军逐出法国的军事行动。
description.en: The military operations during World War II in which the Allies and the French Resistance expelled German occupation forces from France.

description.zh-cn: 法国最著名的军事院校之一。
description.en: One of the most prestigious military academies in France.

description.zh-cn: 法国北部加来海峡省的一个市镇，菲利普·贝当的出生地。
description.en: A commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in northern France, the birthplace of Philippe Pétain.

description.zh-cn: 位于法国大西洋沿岸的一座岛屿，菲利普·贝当在此被监禁并逝世。
description.en: An island off the Atlantic coast of France, where Philippe Pétain was imprisoned and died.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治家，曾两次担任维希法国政府首脑。
description.en: French politician who served as the head of government of Vichy France on two occasions.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治家，曾在维希法国短暂担任政府首脑。
description.en: French politician who briefly served as head of government in Vichy France.

description.zh-cn: 法国海军上将和政治人物，曾在维希法国担任重要职务。
description.en: French admiral and political figure who held significant positions in Vichy France.

description.zh-cn: 法国武装部队的地面部队分支。
description.en: The land-based component of the French Armed Forces.

description.zh-cn: 奥地利裔德国政治人物，纳粹党领袖，1933年至1945年间担任德国总理和元首。
description.en: Austrian-born German politician, leader of the Nazi Party, who was Chancellor and Führer of Germany from 1933 to 1945.

description.zh-cn: 法国政治家，曾任法兰西第三共和国总统和总理。
description.en: French politician who served as President and Prime Minister of France during the Third Republic.

description.zh-cn: 菲利普·贝当于1856年4月24日出生于法国北部的科希阿拉图尔。
description.en: Philippe Pétain was born in Cauchy-à-la-Tour in northern France on April 24, 1856.

description.zh-cn: 菲利普·贝当于1876年加入法国陆军，此前曾就读于圣西尔军事学校。
description.en: Philippe Pétain joined the French Army in 1876 after attending the Saint-Cyr military school.

description.zh-cn: 菲利普·贝当自1876年起在法国陆军服役，担任过从低级军官到陆军总司令等一系列职务，直到1945年其军衔被剥夺。
description.en: Philippe Pétain served in the French Army from 1876, holding various positions from junior officer to Commander-in-Chief, until his military ranks were stripped in 1945.

description.zh-cn: 菲利普·贝当在1940年7月11日成为维希法国的国家元首，掌握全部行政与立法权力。
description.en: Philippe Pétain became the Chief of the French State (Vichy France) on July 11, 1940, holding all executive and legislative powers.

description.zh-cn: 在凡尔登战役中的杰出指挥使菲利普·贝当声名鹊起，被誉为“凡尔登的救星”，成为法国家喻户晓的民族英雄。
description.en: His outstanding command during the Battle of Verdun brought Philippe Pétain to prominence, earning him the title 'Savior of Verdun' and making him a national hero in France.

description.zh-cn: 尼维尔攻势的惨败导致法军士气崩溃并发生兵变，贝当被任命为陆军总司令以稳定局势。
description.en: The disastrous failure of the Nivelle Offensive led to a collapse in French army morale and mutinies, resulting in Pétain's appointment as Commander-in-Chief to restore order.

description.zh-cn: 尼维尔攻势的灾难性失败导致罗贝尔·尼维尔被免去法军总司令职务。
description.en: The catastrophic failure of the Nivelle Offensive led to Robert Nivelle's dismissal as Commander-in-Chief of the French Army.

description.zh-cn: 在1940年法国战役期间，时任总理保罗·雷诺任命贝当为副总理，希望借助其威望稳定局势。
description.en: During the Battle of France in 1940, then-Prime Minister Paul Reynaud appointed Pétain as Vice Premier, hoping his prestige would stabilize the situation.

description.zh-cn: 纳粹德国在1940年的法国战役中击败法国，导致法兰西第三共和国的垮台。
description.en: Nazi Germany defeated France in the Battle of France in 1940, leading to the collapse of the French Third Republic.

description.zh-cn: 维希法国政府在政治、经济、军事等领域与纳粹德国进行合作。
description.en: The Vichy France regime collaborated with Nazi Germany in political, economic, and military spheres.

description.zh-cn: 1944年盟军在法国的推进和巴黎的解放宣告了维希政权的终结。
description.en: The Allied advance in France and the liberation of Paris in August 1944 marked the end of the Vichy regime.

description.zh-cn: 随着法国的解放，菲利普·贝当的维希政权垮台，他本人先被德国人带走，后返回法国接受叛国罪审判。
description.en: With the liberation of France, Philippe Pétain's Vichy regime collapsed. He was first taken by the Germans and later returned to France to face trial for treason.

description.zh-cn: 菲利普·贝当因叛国罪被判处死刑后，时任临时政府主席的夏尔·戴高乐签署特赦令，将其减刑为终身监禁。
description.en: After Philippe Pétain was sentenced to death for treason, Charles de Gaulle, then President of the Provisional Government, commuted his sentence to life imprisonment.

description.zh-cn: 夏尔·戴高乐年轻时曾在驻阿拉斯的第33步兵团服役，当时的团长是菲利普·贝当上校。
description.en: As a young officer, Charles de Gaulle served in the 33rd Infantry Regiment in Arras under the command of then-Colonel Philippe Pétain.

relationships.target: 第二次贡比涅停战协定

description.zh-cn: 由贝当领导的法国政府于1940年6月22日签署了《第二次贡比涅停战协定》，正式向德国投降。
description.en: The French government, led by Pétain, signed the Second Armistice at Compiègne on June 22, 1940, officially surrendering to Germany.

description.zh-cn: 皮埃尔·赖伐尔在维希法国时期担任贝当政府的副元首。
description.en: Pierre Laval served as the Vice-President of the Council in Pétain's government during the Vichy France period.

description.zh-cn: 皮埃尔-艾蒂安·弗朗丹在维希法国时期担任贝当政府的副元首。
description.en: Pierre-Étienne Flandin served as the Vice-President of the Council in Pétain's government during the Vichy France period.

description.zh-cn: 弗朗索瓦·达尔朗在维希法国时期担任贝当政府的副元首。
description.en: François Darlan served as the Vice-President of the Council in Pétain's government during the Vichy France period.

description.zh-cn: 1934年，菲利普·贝当在加斯东·杜梅格担任总理的政府中出任战争部长。
description.en: In 1934, Philippe Pétain served as Minister of War in the government led by Prime Minister Gaston Doumergue.

description.zh-cn: 1940年10月24日，贝当与希特勒在卢瓦河畔蒙图瓦尔会面，商讨两国间的合作事宜。
description.en: On October 24, 1940, Pétain met with Hitler at Montoire-sur-le-Loir to discuss collaboration between their two countries.
